divs: Sighting DetailsTwo witnesses observed a hovering, starlike object in sky, for approximatey 1 hour. Every 10 seconds, the object moved counterclockwise, stopped, then sequence of lights on object lit-up, from left to right. Next, object then moved forward a litle bit, then stopped again. Object repeated this sequence over and over for the one hour duration.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Watervliet
There were no other sightings in Watervliet on or around September 10th 2012
